ygData.subject: RE: Value of lambent stones (was AC Dilemma)
ygData.msgSnippet: Last night, my friend and I made the attempt to kill Choon, pulled him by mistake (went too close) but even though Choon and Froon were standing next to each
ygData.messageBody:
Last night, my friend and I made the attempt to kill Choon, pulled him by
mistake (went too close) but even though Choon and Froon were standing next
to each other only choon chased me.
I ran around in circles while the mage blasted, unfortunately all his
spells were resisted and his pet was too weak, so he gated out and left me
on my own. (Not very nice really)
I had no chance melleeing Choon, he hit in the 70's, so I ran around for 20
minutes trying to get people to help me kill him, finally got to Qeynos
Hill Zone and met a 39 Mage who killed him for me, and can you believe
after all that he didn't even drop the god damn Rune.

Will try again tonight, this time I'm gonna get in a group with someone 30+

Madagan, who only needs the rune to get his Lambent Vambraces!! 8(




>From: Crysarra de'Danaan <lucretia_71@...>
>
>I can tell you that I went to go kill them one night with a level 31
>ranger and my 29th druid and the ranger ended up dying (although I was
>not full mana and wasn't ready for the pull)...they are mean...conned
>yellow to me at 29. If you can keep him from pounding on you too much
>you may be able to have the mage nuke him but...at your level I would
>be really careful adn have an escape route planned....
